name: Becrowned
storyline:
A frightening story on the edge of reality and dreams
Get trapped between reality and a dream. Feel the line between hope and despair. Immerse yourself in a dark and mysterious world where fire no longer burns. Unravel all the mysteries of this world to either return home or aid this world.

Find a way out or stay
A surreal survival horror game where a simple picnic trip with a loved one turns into a nightmare. Fall asleep only to wake up. Walk through the impending darkness and explore all the horrors of the reality you find yourself in. Solve complex puzzles and figure out what is really going on.

Classic survival horror experience
Carefully explore the world, manage your resources wisely, search for answers to puzzles, and experience fear when encountering unknown entities.

A non-linear story with multiple endings
Several closely related storylines come together in a common plot to reveal the secrets of the dark world. However, things can change. Every decision you make affects every aspect of the game world. A complete solution will require several playthroughs.

Technological retro-visual style
A blend of new visual technology and classic retro-visual style complement and enhance the game's story.

Rich filling of the game world
Storytelling with a unique atmosphere, unusual characters whose true motivation can only be revealed by the most inquisitive players.
summary: Surreal survival horror in a world standing between reality and dreams. Unravel all the mysteries of the dark world, escape from your own fears, and explore the terrifying world where fire no longer burns.
